articles.title: 3 Dividend ETFs Better Than SCHD
articles.summary: 24/7 Wall St.: 3 Dividend ETFs Better Than SCHD. Dividend exchange-traded funds (ETFs) have gained traction in 2025. It has helped investors navigate the market uncertainties while ensuring steady passive income. The Schwab US Dividend Equity ETF (NYSEARCA:SCHD) is one of the most popular ETFs today. It is a top choice of many due to the dividend yield of 3.83% and has ensured steady ... 3 Dividend ETFs Better Than SCHD Related tickers mentioned: JEPI, VDADX, VIG.
